articles.content: Rafael Nadal has opened up on the emotions of competing on the tour as a father for the first time. The world No 2 is making his comeback at the Paris Masters after taking some time away following th… [+1810 chars]

articles.title: Norwich City boss replies to January recall question over Plymouth Argyle loan signing Bali Mumba - Plymouth Live
articles.description: Dean Smith was watching on TV as Mumba scored a spectacular goal in Argyle's 4-2 Devon derby win against Exeter City
articles.content:
Norwich City boss Dean Smith has stated it is 'way too early' to make a decision on whether Bali Mumba will be recalled from his loan spell at League One leaders Plymouth Argyle in January.
